name: Black Luster Soldier
description: You can Ritual Summon this card with 'Black Luster Ritual'. Must be Ritual Summoned. You can Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from your hand or field.

name: Elemental HERO Neos Knight
description: Must be Fusion Summoned. This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. This card loses 500 ATK for each Fusion Material Monster used for its Summon.

name: Stardust Dragon
description: You can Tribute this card to negate and destroy a card that would destroy a card(s) on the field, then Special Summon this card during the End Phase.

name: Number 39: Utopia
description: When any player's monster declares an attack, you can detach 1 material from this card; negate the attack.

name: Odd-Eyes Pendulum Dragon
description: Pendulum Effect: You can reduce battle damage you take from battles involving a Pendulum Monster you control to 0. Monster Effect: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, inflict double battle damage.
